commit.message: controller, service and managers for binding schemas
support clear schema from entity and list organizations, schemas ans versions

nodes.bodyText: Might want to consider simplifying the URL to just /entity/{id}/schema/binding or /entity/{id}/jsonschema/binding
Might want to rename to boundEntityId, also the name of the method findFirstBoundJsonSchema might be findFirstNodeIdBoundJsonSchema
We might want to expose the max depth as a parameter so we can test it and set the default at the manager level
